Secondly, we ____ with ____ criticism ____ our ____ and ____ are ____ opaque. In fact, we believe they are as transparent as possible, and should be easily interpretable.
data.partBlankContent: While we deeply appreciate the reviewers comments, we beg to differ on several points. Firstly, the conte_____ that o__ research i_ fabricated i_ an outr____ untruth. Secondly, we disa____ with t__ criticism th__ our gra___ and fig____ are t__ opaque. In fact, we believe they are as transparent as possible, and should be easily interpretable.
data.fullContent: While we deeply appreciate the reviewers comments, we beg to differ on several points. Firstly, the contention that our research is fabricated is an outright untruth. Secondly, we disagree with the criticism that our graphs and figures are too opaque. In fact, we believe they are as transparent as possible, and should be easily interpretable.
data.answer: 虽然我们对审稿人的评论深表赞赏，但我们在几个问题上有不同意见。首先，认为我们的研究是捏造的观点是完全不真实的。其次，我们不同意有人批评我们的图表和数据太不透明。事实上，我们认为它们是尽可能透明的，并且应该易于理解。
